title: EU agency warns against deceptive crypto promotions on social media
description: Social media platforms have long been fertile ground for scammers pushing cryptocurrency schemes, but EU agency BEUC and its member organizations have now issued a stark warning to European authorities regarding the deceptive promotion of digital assets on leading social media networks. title: BNB recorded millions in sell orders before SEC lawsuit
description: In the world of trading, timing can make or break an investment strategy.
